TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLink extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: 一个控件，显示指向另一个网页的链接。

span.span: A control that displays a link to another Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件创建另一个 Web 页面的链接。Use the control to create a link to another Web page. 控件通常显示为指定文本属性。The control is typically displayed as text specified by the property. 它还可以显示由指定的映像为属性。It can also be displayed as an image specified by the property. 如果这两个并设置的属性，属性优先。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence. 如果图像不可用中的文本显示属性。If the image is unavailable, the text in the property is displayed. 支持工具提示功能的浏览器中属性也将成为工具提示。In browsers that support ToolTip functionality, the property also becomes the ToolTip. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以便它将生成符合辅助功能标准标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建控制在网页上链接到另一个 Web 页面。The following example demonstrates how to create a control on a Web page that links to another Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写中的自定义服务器控件的方法，以便中加粗字体显示的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the text is displayed in a bold font. [!code-csharp[CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_hyperlink_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_hyperlink_addattributestorender.vb#2)] 以下 Web 窗体使用自定义服务器控件来显示为粗体的字体的超链接。The following Web Form uses the custom server control to display a hyperlink with a bold font. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_hyperlink_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_hyperlink_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Notifies the control that an element was parsed, and adds the element to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生中的一个自定义控件时，使用此方法主要由控件开发人员类。This method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the class. 如果输入的对象是，并控件不具有任何子控件，然后输入的对象用于设置控件的属性。If the input object is a , and the control has no child controls, then the input object is used to set the property of the control. 否则为方法的基的类称为和指定的对象添加到集合。Otherwise, the method of the base class is called and the specified object is added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法在自定义服务器控件，以便始终将文本属性设置为已分析的对象的 text 属性的已分析的对象是否，和为空字符串否则为。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always sets the text property to the parsed object's text property, if the parsed object is a , and to an empty string otherwise. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_hyperlink_addparsedsubobjectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_hyperlink_addparsedsubobjectvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_hyperlink_addparsedsubobject.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_hyperlink_addparsedsubobject.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为 控件显示的图像的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to an image to display for the control.

value.span: 为 控件显示的图像的路径。

span.span: The path to the image to display for the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以显示为文本或图像。The control can be displayed as text or an image. 使用属性来指定要显示的图像控件。Use the property to specify an image to display for the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果这两个并设置的属性，属性优先。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence. 如果图像不可用中的文本显示属性。If the image is unavailable, the text in the property is displayed. 支持工具提示功能的浏览器中属性也将成为工具提示。In browsers that support ToolTip functionality, the property also becomes the ToolTip. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性来指定要显示的图像的路径。The following example demonstrates how to set the property to specify the path to the image to display. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示如何 ASP.NET 应呈现 HTML 控件的控件处于禁用状态时。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 会将`disabled`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 会将`class`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Property Target As String
public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单击 控件时显示链接到的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 单击 控件时加载链接到的网页的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame to load the Web page linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 值必须以 a 到 z 的字母（不区分大小写）开头，但下表所列以下划线开头的特殊值除外。

span.span: Values must begin with a letter in the range of a through z (case-insensitive), except for the special values listed in the following table, which begin with an underscore.

value.span:
将在新窗口中没有框架内容的呈现。
呈现直接框架集父级中的内容。
将呈现在搜索窗格中的内容。
呈现具有焦点的框架中的内容。
呈现中没有框架的完整窗口的内容。
请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持值。例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持目标值。 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span:
Renders the content in a new window without frames.
Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.
Renders the content in the search pane.
Renders the content in the frame with focus.
Renders the content in the full window without frames.
Check your browser documentation to determine if the value is supported. For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the target value. The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的框架或窗口，其中显示 Web 页面链接到时单击控件。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page linked to when the control is clicked. 通过设置指定 Web 页属性。The Web page is specified by setting the property. 如果未设置此属性，浏览器或窗口具有焦点时刷新单击控件。If this property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性将呈现为`target`属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`特性，可以在`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许元素。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未设置属性如果呈现的输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅主题[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在创建可访问网页时，强烈建议您不要使用属性将另一个窗口作为目标。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)并[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性指定的窗口或框架以显示与关联的页控件。The following example demonstrates how to set the property to specify the window or frame to display the page associated with the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HyperLink.Target Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.Target Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HyperLink.Target Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.Target Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的文本标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the text caption for the control.
The text caption for the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以显示为文本或图像。The control can be displayed as text or an image. 使用属性来指定要显示的文本控件。Use the property to specify the text to display for the control. 如果这两个并设置的属性，属性优先。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence. 如果图像不可用中的文本显示属性。If the image is unavailable, the text in the property is displayed. 支持工具提示功能的浏览器中属性也将成为工具提示。In browsers that support ToolTip functionality, the property also becomes the ToolTip. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定要显示的文本控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text to display for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HyperLink.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.Text Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HyperLink.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.Text Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
